mapper.select: select distinct a.ORMMNO from ORD_BW_ORDMT a,ORD_BW_ORDHD b where a.ORMMNO=b.ORMMNO and a.ormtno=#{ormtno} and b.ORSTAT=0
select distinct a.MMORNO from ORD_BW_ORDMT a,ORD_BW_ORDHD b where a.ORMMNO=b.ORMMNO and a.ormtno=#{ormtno} and b.ORSTAT=0 and b.bradno=#{bradno} and b.spclno=#{spclno}
select max(b.orstat) from ORD_BW_ORDMT a,ORD_BW_ORDHD b where a.ORMMNO=b.ORMMNO and a.ormtno=#{ormtno} and b.ORSTAT=0 and b.bradno=#{bradno} and b.spclno=#{spclno}
select min(szstat) from ORD_ORDHD where mtorno=#{mtorno} and bradno=#{bradno} and spclno=#{spclno}

select b.ORMMNO,w.mldate,w.pldate,w.pplace,c.mmorno,c.ordorg,f.orgnm,c.sampno,c.suitno,d.sampnm,e.sptyno,e.spseno,d.versno,g.prodnm,sum(orszqt*nvl(v.packqt,1)) orszqt from ORD_BW_ORDMT a inner join ORD_BW_ORDHD b on a.ORMMNO=b.ORMMNO inner join ORD_BW_ORDSZDTL c on b.MMORNO=c.MMORNO inner join ord_sample_design d on c.sampno=d.sampno inner join ord_sample_plan e on d.plspno=e.plspno inner join t_org f on c.ordorg=f.orgno left join ORD_SAMPLE_PROD g on c.sampno=g.sampno LEFT JOIN ( SELECT FSZTY,FSZNO,SUM(SIZEQT) packqt FROM ORD_PUB_SIZEDTL WHERE FSZTY='PRDPK' AND SIZETY='STDSZ' GROUP BY FSZTY,FSZNO) v ON c.SIZETY=v.FSZTY AND c.SIZENO=v.FSZNO left join ord_bw_orddt w on b.ORMMNO=w.ORMMNO and b.mmorno=w.mmorno and c.ordorg=w.ordorg and c.sampno=w.sampno and c.suitno=w.suitno where b.mmorno=#{mmorno} group by b.ORMMNO,w.mldate,w.pldate,w.pplace,c.mmorno,c.ordorg,f.orgnm,c.sampno,c.suitno,d.sampnm,e.sptyno,e.spseno,d.versno,g.prodnm order by e.sptyno,e.spseno,d.versno,g.prodnm
